head.title: U.S. Open Tickets To Go on Sale

hedline.hl1: U.S. Open Tickets To Go on Sale

abstract.p: Individual tickets for US Open are set to go on sale (S)

block.p: Individual tickets for this summer's United States Open go on sale on Sunday at 9 a.m.
The Open runs from Monday, Aug. 28, through Sunday, Sept. 10. Day sessions begin at 11 a.m. each day except Sunday, Sept. 10, when play begins at noon. Evening sessions are Aug. 28 through Sept. 7.
Individual tickets for this summer's United States Open go on sale on Sunday at 9 a.m.
The Open runs from Monday, Aug. 28, through Sunday, Sept. 10. Day sessions begin at 11 a.m. each day except Sunday, Sept. 10, when play begins at noon. Evening sessions are Aug. 28 through Sept. 7.

Tickets can be purchased these ways: at the National Tennis Center box office in Flushing Meadows-Corona Park, Queens; by calling Tele-Charge at 1-888-OPENTIX or (212) 239-6200; by visiting the Tele-Charge website at www.telecharge.com., and beginning Monday, at the TKTS booth at 2 World Trade Center. Prices range from $22 to $85.
Ticket prices for Arthur Ashe Kids' Day, which is Aug. 26, are $15 and $10. Spectators will receive a free ticket for children 12 and under with purchase of each adult promenade ticket.
